english.segment1: I could not lie. Skin untouched growing thicker for every step unwalked. And I don't know if it's the cold intention-slide. Taking me down
english.segment2: But what if You'd sing me alive. I'm ready to give up the fight. Cause I'm just a stone. Right after You're gone
english.segment3: I could not lie. Even though dead skin like stone makes me ugly. It still pounds inside and it's red. And it's slipping through the grey cracks. And I know You know
english.segment4: But what if You'd sing me alive. I'm ready to give up the fight. Cause I'm just a stone. Right after You're gone
english.segment5: The first thing that meets the eye. When I crossover into the light. I want it to be You. Right after I'm gone
